thread.title: 2 dead in Irvine shooting; investigation underway

title: 2 dead in Irvine shooting; investigation underway
text: 02:27PM IRVINE, Calif. (KABC) -- An investigation is underway after two people were found dead following a shooting in Irvine, police confirmed on Tuesday.According to Irvine police, the shooting occurred in the 14900 block of Crystal Circle. Authorities said the suspect has been taken into custody.Investigators did not release further details surrounding the shooting. . @IrvinePolice confirm they're investigating a shooting at 14900 block of Crystal Circle. PD says two found dead at scene. #Irvine @abc7 â€” Greg Lee (@abc7greg) January 31, 2017 DEVELOPING...We will add more details to this report as they become available. Related Topics:
